name: mad-numdiff
description: compare unformatted text files with numerical content

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependent_to.name: quinoa
dependent_to.description:
Quinoa is a set of computational tools that enables research and
numerical analysis in fluid dynamics. At this time it is a test-bed to
experiment with various algorithms using fully asynchronous runtime
systems.
